item.title: MRK
item.description: score:65 Chances: The latest trading day saw Merck (MRK) settling at $118.49, representing a -0.12% change from its previous close. Merck’s stock price might be vulnerable to institutional stake. Risks: Many Merck & Co., Inc. insiders have been selling their stock over the past year, which may be a cause for concern.
